In England, in the seven days to 08 April, there were 246,860 new confirmed cases (436.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 April, there were 404,363 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 39% (157,503 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 13 April is 18,277,995 (32,321.8 cases per 100,000 population).
